attributes.action: go ahead with road pricing so long as road tax and fuel tax is abolished
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
You only pay for one TV license yet you can have as many TVs on your premises as you like. Road charging will mean you can have as many cars as you like an efficient run around for work and a nice comfortable car for long journeys and even a 4x4 for the weekend yet you will only be charged for the one which you are using. 
Some other good reasons:

1 Its better for me to use public transport for work and shopping as parking is a nightmare yet when im using the bus im still paying for my car?
2 why should I pay the same as a light road user as a heavy road user
3 there just isn’t the room for many more cars
4 When you have metered services at home ie water you will use less and be more efficient with what you do use

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
